snippet.title: Brand New Open World Sandbox RPG "TERAVIT" 1st Trailer!
snippet.description:
Brand new open-world sandbox RPG TERAVIT's first trailer!
Now recruiting Alpha Test participants in Japan!

TERAVIT is an open-world sandbox RPG with online multiplayer support.
Adventurers explore a vast, randomly generated world guided by an 8-bit Megami to defeat the menacing Demon King.

Official website is now open!
https://teravit.app

--
Title: TERAVIT
Genre: Open World Sandbox RPG
Number of Players: Online Multiplayer Support
Platform: Windows 8.1 / 10 (PlayStation®4 / Nintendo Switch™ / iOS / Android TBD）
Website: https://teravit.app/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/teravit_en
--
